name: NFTTRPG
description:
This simple 1-page game is about creativity and collaboration

Take turns describing an ever increasingly silly NFT, and if you're the Client, decide to keep it for yourself or see what else gets added! No actual artwork or drawing required.

3+ players recommended (2 players if you decided you are BOTH the Client)

Needed: Token tracker of some kind. Dice, pencil and tally sheet, memory better than mine...
